project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a text file and count word frequencies
Create functionality to identify and sort the top 10 most common words
Output the top 10 most common words to the terminal
Write tests for the implemented functionality
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure correct functionality
